Package tilt.image

This package handles everything directly related to the manipulation of images, and preparing them for text-to-image linking.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Blob
    An amorphous region of connected black pixels in an image
    BlurImage
    Blur a two-tone image so that lines can be recognised more reliably
    Border
    Compute the best border for an image
    FindLinesBlurred
    Find the lines based on a Gaussian-blurred image
    FindWords
    Using the lines lists search for words
    Picture
    Handle everything related to the abstract image in all its forms
    PictureRegistry
    Keep a track of temporary files and delete them after a set time
    ReduceLines
    Remove lines that intersect with blobs that already have a longer line
    RemoveNoise
    Remove big black blobs from two-tone pictures.

Package tilt.image Description

This package handles everything directly related to the manipulation of images, and preparing them for text-to-image linking. The
  • Blob class identifies connected pixels in B&W images.
  • The Border class identifies blobs close to the edges that can be safely deleted.
  • The tilt.image.FastConvexHull algorithm selects those points that are outliers of a set of points representing something, and draws a convex polygon around them.
  • The tilt.image.FindLines class identifies lines in various kinds of textual images.
  • The Picture class manages the picture, originally fetch from a URL, in its many formats: B& W, original, with lines etc.
  • Pictures are stored in the PictureRegistry, which manages the temporary files associated with each image type. Images are regularly deleted when no longer required and are only loaded into memory when needed.
  • The RemoveNoise class supervises the removal of noise in the borders and anomalous blobs in the inner border.
  • The tilt.image.XCompare class is a comparison method needed by tilt.image.FastConvexHull.
